technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant mentions having some reactions to the vaccine, but doesn't express strong negative affect.

communal_orientation: The participant engages in conversation and shares her experiences, but doesn't go out of her way to build a strong connection with the conversation partner.
engagement: The participant is engaged in the conversation and shares her experiences, but doesn't go out of her way to keep the conversation going.
defensiveness: The participant does not display any defensive behavior.
vaccine_importance: The participant took the vaccine because her son and daughter-in-law had COVID, suggesting she believes vaccines are important.
booster_importance: The participant took the booster because she was told it would protect her from other variants, suggesting she believes boosters are somewhat important.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrates a moderate amount of cognitive complexity by considering the pros and cons of the vaccine and booster.
general_notes: The participant seems to be a bit skeptical about the vaccine, but ultimately believes it is important to protect herself and her family.
